name: Ai Sensei No Oshiete: Watashi No Hoshi
summary: Ai Sensei No Oshiete: Watashi No Hoshi is a horoscope simulation game that heavily revolves around the love thematics of fortune-telling. The title roughly translates as Love Teacher Oshiete: My Star, which suggests the game focuses on the astrological aspects of fortune-telling and horoscopes.
